intro.p: {{prose}} {{n}} {{sample1}} \bar{x}_1={{xbar1}} {{units}}, with sample standard deviation s_1={{s1}} {{units}}. Then out of {{n}} {{sample2}} \bar{x}_2={{xbar2}} {{units}}, with sample standard deviation s_2={{s2}} {{units}}.

content.p: Find a {{CL}}% confidence interval for the {{population}}. Using complete sentences, explain what the confidence interval means in the context of this problem.

outtro.p: We are {{CL}}\% confident that {{population}} is between [{{LB}}, {{UB}}] {{units}}.
